description: Project Formulation for Enhanced Support to UNSF Implementation through M & E and Joint Programming

subproject.description: Joint programming is the collective effort of UN agencies and national partners to prepare, implement, monitor and evaluate activities aimed at efficient achievement of the MDG and other international and national commitments. Consultations between RC, NCC and UNCT concluded with agreement on increased collaboration for greater development impact. The objective of this preparatory  activity  is to establish the necessary conditions for actual joint programming in DPRK and develop the full scale project document on “Enhanced Support to UNSF implementation” for joint programme in order to evaluate the impact of UN interventions to four focused counties during the current UNSF cycle (2011-2015).
subproject.title: Support for JP

title: Project Formulation for Support to UNSF Implementation
